data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huerta, Herón, Ibáñez-Bernal, Sergio (2008): New records of Scatopsidae (Diptera) from southeastern Mexico, and descriptions of new species of Swammerdamella Enderlein and Colobostema Enderlein. Zootaxa 1720: 57-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181111
